title: Ep 6. - Pet Peeves
description:
On today's show, the guys discuss a concession worker at Comerica Park in Detroit spitting in people's pizza, Todd wants to know what profession everyone would choose if they were going to be elite at what they do, the guys let each other know what some of their biggest pet peeves are, they decide who they want to take a shot with or take a shot at, answer some listener questions, and give out a couple vitamin thoughts to end the show. It's a good one. Come join us.

This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and a comedy clip from comedian @BrentMorin.
dc:creator: The Pod
